api_list.name: Facebook Ad Copy

parameters.name: description
parameters.default: Apple designs, manufactures and markets smartphones, personal computers, tablets, wearables and accessories, and sells a variety of related services.

utterances.utterance: Create a Facebook ad for Tesla, highlighting their electric vehicles and innovative technology.

parameters.name: Tesla
parameters.description: Tesla designs and manufactures electric vehicles, battery energy storage, and solar products, focusing on innovation and sustainability.

utterances.utterance: Generate a Facebook ad copy for Nike, emphasizing their sportswear and commitment to athletes.

parameters.name: Nike
parameters.description: Nike is a global leader in athletic footwear, apparel, and equipment, inspiring athletes with innovative products and a commitment to performance.

utterances.utterance: Write a Facebook ad for Starbucks, focusing on their coffee and cozy café experience.

parameters.name: Starbucks
parameters.description: Starbucks offers high-quality coffee, handcrafted beverages, and a welcoming café environment for customers to relax and connect.

utterances.utterance: Make a Facebook ad for Samsung, showcasing their latest smartphones and electronics.

parameters.name: Samsung
parameters.description: Samsung is a leading manufacturer of smartphones, televisions, home appliances, and innovative consumer electronics.

utterances.utterance: Create a Facebook ad for Amazon, highlighting fast shipping and a wide selection of products.

parameters.name: Amazon
parameters.description: Amazon is the world's largest online retailer, offering fast shipping, a vast selection of products, and convenient shopping experiences.

utterances.utterance: Generate a Facebook ad for Airbnb, focusing on unique travel experiences and home rentals.

parameters.name: Airbnb
parameters.description: Airbnb connects travelers with unique accommodations and experiences around the world, making travel more personal and memorable.

utterances.utterance: Write a Facebook ad for Coca-Cola, emphasizing their refreshing beverages and iconic brand.

parameters.name: Coca-Cola
parameters.description: Coca-Cola is a global beverage company known for its refreshing soft drinks and commitment to bringing people together.

utterances.utterance: Make a Facebook ad for Microsoft, highlighting their software solutions and cloud services.

parameters.name: Microsoft
parameters.description: Microsoft develops software, hardware, and cloud services, empowering individuals and organizations to achieve more.

utterances.utterance: Create a Facebook ad for Netflix, focusing on their streaming service and original content.

parameters.name: Netflix
parameters.description: Netflix is a leading streaming service offering a wide variety of TV shows, movies, and original content for subscribers worldwide.

utterances.utterance: Generate a Facebook ad for Toyota, showcasing their reliable vehicles and commitment to sustainability.

parameters.name: Toyota
parameters.description: Toyota manufactures reliable cars, trucks, and hybrids, with a focus on innovation, safety, and environmental responsibility.
